arcs.headline: Polly gets a brain boost
arcs.summary: Our AI assistant Polly received a major intelligence upgrade. We switched to OpenAI embeddings for more accurate document retrieval and tuned the system prompt to deliver snappier, more focused answers.

arcs.headline: Streamlined model access
arcs.summary: Developers gain more control over the model registry. You can now access legacy models via API without cluttering the main dashboard, and we've optimized the routing for Claude integrations.

arcs.headline: Smoother credits & open metrics
arcs.summary: We improved the Pollen credit system for more reliable balance updates. True to our building-in-public philosophy, we also added new dashboards to visualize platform load and economics.

one_liner: Polly gets smarter with new embeddings, plus smoother credit handling and new transparency dashboards.
